movies.title: Drei Mann auf einem Pferd
movies.plot: A man has discovered a fail-proof way of betting on the winning horse in any race. There is only one catch: He must never be the person to place the bet.
movies.simplePlot: A man has discovered a fail-proof way of betting on the winning horse in any race. There is only one catch: He must never be the person to place the bet.

biography.bio: Nadja Tiller was born on March 16, 1929 in Vienna, Austria as Maria Nadja Tiller. She is an actress, known for Barefoot (2005), Rosemary (1958) and L'Aventurière bien-aimée (1961). She was previously married to Walter Giller.
biography.name: Nadja Tiller

biography.bio: Gardy Granass was born on January 7, 1930 in Berlin, Germany as Hildegard Erika Charlotte Granass. She is an actress, known for Landarzt Dr. Brock (1967), Drei Mädels vom Rhein (1955) and Heidelberger Romanze (1951). She was previously married to Werner Hess.
biography.name: Gardy Granass

biography.bio: Theo Lingen was born on June 10, 1903 in Hanover, Germany as Franz Theodor Schmitz. He was an actor and director, known for M (1931), Le testament du docteur Mabuse (1933) and Um eine Nasenlänge (1949). He was married to Marianne Zoff. He died on November 10, 1978 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Theo Lingen

biography.bio: Kurt Meisel was born on August 18, 1912 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary as Kurt Franz-Joseph Meisel. He was an actor and director, known for The Odessa File (1974), Vater sein dagegen sehr (1957) and Der Teufel führt Regie (1951). He was married to Ursula Lingen. He died on April 4, 1994 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Kurt Meisel

biography.bio: Walter Gross was born on February 5, 1904 in Eberswalde, Germany as Walter Hugo Gross. He was an actor, known for Drüben bei Lehmanns (1970), One or the Other (1974) and Frauen wollen betrogen sein (1937). He was married to Ingeborg Strakosch and Lou Seitz. He died on May 17, 1989 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Walter Gross

biography.bio: Walter Müller was born on May 6, 1911 in Prague, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for La femme de mes rêves (1944), Einmal keine Sorgen haben (1953) and Bravo je suis papa! (1953). He died on March 2, 1969 in Starnberg, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Walter Müller

biography.bio: Harry Tagore is an actor, known for The Last Pedestrian (1960), Drei Mann auf einem Pferd (1957) and Hexenschuß (1960).
biography.name: Harry Tagore

biography.bio: Carla Hagen was born on September 11, 1931 in Hamburg, Germany as Carla-Maria Hagen. She is an actress, known for Le plongeon de Véra (1999), Die Frau des Fotografen oder Die große Liebe (1967) and Hôtel du commerce (1969).
biography.name: Carla Hagen

biography.bio: Willy Millowitsch was born on January 8, 1909 in Cologne, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for Donaug'schichten (1965), National Lampoon's European Vacation (1985) and Der Etappenhase (1969). He was married to Gerda Feldhoff and Linny Lüttgen. He died on September 20, 1999 in Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany.
biography.name: Willy Millowitsch

biography.bio: Friedl Hardt was born on January 28, 1919 in Munich, Germany. She was an actress, known for Der Tiger Akbar (1951), Die Todesarena (1953) and Amour, tango, mandoline (1955). She died on June 11, 1991 in Munich.
biography.name: Friedl Hardt

biography.bio: Walter Giller was born on August 23, 1927 in Recklinghausen, Germany. He was an actor, known for Drei Mann in einem Boot (1961), The Conjugal Bed (1963) and The Captain from Köpenick (1956). He was married to Nadja Tiller. He died on December 15, 2011 in Hamburg, Germany.
biography.name: Walter Giller

biography.bio: Gerold Wanke is an actor, known for Gerechtigkeit in Worowogorsk (1964), Heute letzter Tag (Ein Abend im 'Eldorado') (1960) and La Joyeuse Débandade (1958).
biography.name: Gerold Wanke

filmingLocations.location: Berliner Union-Film, Oberlandstraße 26-35, Tempelhof, Berlin, Germany
